help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="exportPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="neighborIpExclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array<@NeighborAddress_read>" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@ConnectedSubnet_read>" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_read>" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.exportPolicyConfiguration.exportPolicies" options="export-policies">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.neighborIpExclusions" options="neighbor-ip-exclusions">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv4-listen-range-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" options="ipv4-neighbor-address">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv6-listen-range-prefixes">
<arg type="array<@NeighborAddress_create>" var="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" options="ipv6-neighbor-address">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.connectedIPv4Subnets" options="connected-ipv4-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@ConnectedSubnet_create>" var="$resource.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" options="connected-ipv6-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.nativeIpv4PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.nativeIpv6PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array" var="@StaticRouteProperties_create.nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="exportPolicies" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.exportPolicyConfiguration.exportPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="neighborIpExclusions" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.neighborIpExclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array<@NeighborAddress_create>" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" arg="$resource.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" arg="$resource.properties.connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@ConnectedSubnet_create>" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" arg="$resource.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits" arg="$resource.properties.nativeIpv4PrefixLimit.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_create>" name="prefixLimits" arg="$resource.properties.nativeIpv6PrefixLimit.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="@StaticRouteProperties_create.nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

<prop type="array" name="exportPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="neighborIpExclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array<@NeighborAddress_read>" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@ConnectedSubnet_read>" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_read>" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.neighborIpExclusions" options="neighbor-ip-exclusions">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv4-listen-range-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" options="ipv4-neighbor-address">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6ListenRangePrefixes" options="ipv6-listen-range-prefixes">
<arg type="array<@NeighborAddressPatch_update>" var="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" options="ipv6-neighbor-address">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$properties.properties.connectedIPv4Subnets" options="connected-ipv4-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@ConnectedSubnetPatch_update>" var="$properties.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" options="connected-ipv6-subnets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.nativeIpv4PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array<@PrefixLimitPatchProperties_update>" var="$properties.properties.nativeIpv6PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array" var="@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update.nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True">
<arg type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" var="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="neighborIpExclusions" arg="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.bmpConfiguration.neighborIpExclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes" arg="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" arg="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes" arg="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array<@NeighborAddressPatch_update>" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" arg="$properties.properties.bgpConfiguration.ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop nullable="True" type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" arg="$properties.properties.connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop nullable="True" type="array<@ConnectedSubnetPatch_update>" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" arg="$properties.properties.connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits" arg="$properties.properties.nativeIpv4PrefixLimit.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@PrefixLimitPatchProperties_update>" name="prefixLimits" arg="$properties.properties.nativeIpv6PrefixLimit.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update.nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

<prop type="array" name="exportPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="neighborIpExclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="ipv6ListenRangePrefixes">
<prop type="array<@NeighborAddress_read>" name="ipv6NeighborAddress" identifiers="address">
<prop type="array" name="connectedIPv4Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@ConnectedSubnet_read>" name="connectedIPv6Subnets" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_read>" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
